title: CIT001
source_name_ch1: Frozen tissue of primary colorectal Adenocarcinoma (discovery)
treatment_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
extract_protocol_ch1: E1: total RNA was extracted using Trizol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA), E2: total RNA was extracted using Manual-Cesium Chloride, E3: total RNA was extracted using  Manual-Rneasy Micro (Qiagen), E4: total RNA was extracted using Manual-Rneasy Mini (Qiagen), E5: total RNA was extracted using RNA NOW, E6: total RNA was extracted using  TriReagent & Manual-Rneasy Mini (Qiagen)
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA targets were prepared from 3.0 mg of total RNA, according to the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual : One-Cycle Target Labeling Assay (P/N 701021 Rev.5, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, USA).
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
description.8: When gene.mutation=M (mutated), than we have details in exon, protein and DNA.
description.10: gene.mutation=WT (wild type), the exon, protein and DNA columns are NA (not applicable).
description.13: And BRAF.mutation.Protein means the AA Mutation (http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/mutation/overview?id=521)
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )

title: CIT584
source_name_ch1: Frozen tissue of non tumoral colorectal mucosa
treatment_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
extract_protocol_ch1: E3: total RNA was extracted using  Manual-Rneasy Micro (Qiagen)
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA targets were prepared from 3.0 mg of total RNA, according to the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual : One-Cycle Target Labeling Assay (P/N 701021 Rev.5, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, USA).
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 μg of cRNAs were hybridized for 16 hours at 45°C, 60 rpm on Human GeneChip HG-U133 Plus 2.0 arrays (Affymetrix).  The chips were washed and stained in the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix) using the EukGE-WS2v5_450.
scan_protocol: Scanner GeneChip 3000 7G ; Wavelenght : 570 nm, size pixel: 1.56 µm ; each chip is scanned once; Http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/manual/expression_manual.affx
data_processing: RMA normalisation (Bioconductor R affy package) + ComBat (R sva package )
